Where can a person find more information about Medicare?
                
A person can find more information about Medicare by
                
- visiting the Medicare website  - calling 1800MEDICARE
                
Medicare website. Read more about Medicare at www.medicare.gov, the official U.S. Government website for people with Medicare. The website has a full range of information about Medicare, including free publications s
